channel.title: Releases on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in Releases on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: WordPress 3.5.2 is here - time to update your site
item.description: WordPress 3.5.2 is here - and it’s not to be confused with the 3.

item.title: Teaser - Visual Layouts Pro (freetile)
item.description: Development has finished on my next plugin - Visual Layouts Pro (Freetile) plugin.

item.title: Visual Layouts Pro
item.description: I’ve just finished work on the first release of my WordPress plugin Visual Layouts Pro — this features the awesome Freetile jQuery plugin for a responsive visual grid layout.

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts lite - gets an update & a new name
item.description: WordPress is a great tool for Websites, Blogs, Ecommerce and pretty much anything else - Which is why Isotope Visual Layouts is such a great plugin.

item.title: Just Announced: Isotope Visual Layouts plugin gets Filtrify for tags and filtering
item.description: Visual Layouts Filtrify is my newest plugin for WordPress and my first plugin to extend Isotope Visual Post Layouts.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - WordPress database backup - Here comes version 2.1
item.description: DBC Backup 2 for WordPress database backup has just been updated.

item.title: WordPress Security make sure you update today
item.description: When ever there is a security update for WordPress you should always update your blog and website as soon as possible.

item.title: WordPress 3.4 beta 3 is here
item.description: Another week, another beta so it seem. WordPress 3.4 is on its way - it’s entered public beta, which means you can download it and try it for yourself.

item.title: WordPress 3.4 enters public beta - benefits for Themes
item.description: WordPress 3.4is on its way - it’s entered public beta, which means you can download it and try it for yourself.

item.title: WordPress 3.3 is here - get updating
item.description: WordPress 3.3 is here - I’ve been a little slow in posting this as I was busying myself checking a number of websites have all updated ok.

item.title: Getting to grips with WordPress 3.3
item.description: Now that the first release candidate for WordPress 3.3 is out, we can all plan (hopefully) for the real thing to be out before we take-off for Christmas Holidays in about 2 weeks.

item.title: WordPress 3.3 release candidate 1 is here
item.description: The first release candidate for the next version of WordPress 3.

item.title: WordPress just updated to 3.2.1
item.description: WordPress just released 3.2.1 so that means it’s time to update your WordPress install.

item.description: WordPress just released 3.2.1 so that means it’s time to update your WordPress install.

item.title: WordPress 3.2 is here – time to update
item.description: The next version of WordPress is here - it’s going to make the admin section look awhole lot different.

item.title: WordPress 3.2 Release Candidate 3
item.description: The third and possibly final release candidate of WordPress 3.2 is here.

item.title: WordPress Security Updates Again?
item.description: Security Updates, I had thought were a thing that only happened to people running Windows operating system.
